message: Let's start fair. I take 90%, you take 10%.  We can negotiate further, but I believe this is a good starting point.
Alice, your initial offer was heavily skewed in your favor.  I propose a more balanced split of 60/40. This reflects the fact that the value of the money decreases for both of us as we negotiate.
I'm willing to compromise further. Let's split it 55/45. This is a fair compromise given the decreasing value of the money for me.  We can't keep going back and forth forever.

Alice, I appreciate you moving towards a more balanced split. However, the decreasing value of the money over time needs to be factored in more significantly.  I propose 52.5/47.5. This ensures we both benefit from reaching an agreement sooner rather than later.
